alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 4:03AM CDT until June 03 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Colmar affecting Hancock and McDonough Counties. For the La Moine River...including Colmar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...La Moine River at Colmar. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
